ðŸ“– Summary: Arq is a Python library for fast job queuing and RPC using asyncio and Redis. It enables developers to offload tasks to background workers for asynchronous processing, improving application responsiveness and scalability. Arq leverages Redis for message brokering and asyncio for concurrent execution.
